component.name: PyGenius AI
component.summary: Python coding assistant with AI-powered features

description.p: PyGenius AI is a desktop application for Python coding with AI-powered features. It provides a complete development environment for learning and writing Python code.

ul.li: Code editor with syntax highlighting and line numbers
Built-in Python console for running code in real-time
AI Tutor powered by OpenRouter API for answering Python questions
Dark theme for comfortable coding sessions
File operations (New, Open, Save, Save As)

screenshot.caption: PyGenius AI main window with code editor

description.p: Initial release of PyGenius AI Desktop
